 #[derive(Debug, Clone, Serialize, Deserialize)]
 pub enum Status {
     Ok,
     Error,
     InProgress,
+    Undefined,
+}
+
+impl From<String> for Command {
+    fn from(source: String) -> Self {
+        match source.to_lowercase().trim() {
+            "stop" => Dictionary::Cambridge,
+            "ping" => Dictionary::Collins,
+            "status" => Dictionary::Oxford,
+            "execute" => Dictionary::Oxford,
+            "pause" => Dictionary::Oxford,
+            _ => Dictionary::Undefined,
+        }
+    }
 }
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -34,13 +34,13 @@
 
 impl From<String> for Command {
     fn from(source: String) -> Self {
         match source.to_lowercase().trim() {
-            "stop" => Dictionary::Cambridge,
-            "ping" => Dictionary::Collins,
-            "status" => Dictionary::Oxford,
-            "execute" => Dictionary::Oxford,
-            "pause" => Dictionary::Oxford,
-            _ => Dictionary::Undefined,
+            "stop" => Command::Stop,
+            "ping" => Command::Ping,
+            "status" => Command::Status,
+            "execute" => Command::Execute,
+            "pause" => Command::Pause,
+            _ => Command::Undefined,
         }
     }
 }
\ No newline at end of file

+            "in_progress" => Status::InProgress,
             _ => Status::Undefined,
         }
     }
 }
